name: Staircase of Darkness: VR
description:
Staircase of Darkness is a horror/experimental virtual reality game where you as a main character have to finish the level by going down of the staircase. Would you have guts to finish the staircase?

Key bindings:

Use your right controllers touchpad to walk:



And use your left controller as a flashlight.

It's perfect to play in a standing position! Enjoy!
